Philippines[edit]

Main article: List of castles in Philippines
  • Ferdinand Castle - Official residence of one the princes of Coron, Palawan, Philippines. Built by Datu Fernando Cruz. Partly destroyed by Supertyphoon Haiyan in 2013.
  • Camelot Hotel - A Medieval-themed hotel in the form of a castle located in Quezon City, Philippines.
